resources.string: Tap and hold button to record
Already have an account? Sign in here

Note: This app does not provide any kind of credibility for the outcome of the assessment process, also the producer of this app is not responsible if any dispute occurs in the coming future related to this product. Although, User of this product may get brief idea about their health condition and its symptomatic similarity with COVID19 (corona virus) disease.
Welcome to self test , an independent health testing platform !!
Please provide your registered email addresss
Welcom to self test ! You are successfully signed in.
Please provide your answers by choosing one of the answers given below.
Click on GET INFO for live feed
Data which is given here is checked and confirmed by WHO and other credible websites.
Please provide your valid information here !

1. The information shared by the users and this Self Test app may contain Health-related and personal data information.
2. However, Self test app, does not own any of such data or information shared between the Users and this application.
3. Therefore, producers and all the key members of this app cannot be held liability for any event occurred relating to such data.
4. Assessment of this app cannot be consider as a confirmed test for any kind of diseases but it is a screening which may provide enough detail to determine symptomatic similarity of the user with any diseased (or COVID 19 infected) person.
5. This the self-testing app where we cannot provide the guarantee of the assessment result, the result can be considered as an assistance to take a best decision at worst situations.
6. The overall system may render false suggestion in case of wrong attempts to the quest given here.
\"1.Do you or anyone from your family have been come or visited from corona hotspot(high risk) zone? \"
2.Did you look after any positive or confirmed Corona virus patient, or been near to them?
3. Do you offer any of the following services?
4.Did you attend any public gathering (religious/political/social) in past 14 days?
6.Do you cough? If yes, then kindly mention whether it is dry or wet.
8. Do you find difficulty in breathing (shortness of breath)?
\"9. Do you experience any of the following? \"
10.How often do you hear about Corona? Rate it in a scale of 1 to 10.
10.How often do you hear about Corona? Rate it in a scale of 1 to 10.
11.How attentive are you about following the preventive measures, like social-distancing or personal hygiene? Rate it in a scale of 1 to 10
Your assessement is Ready ....Please Check Your Score below..
Call Doctor- or any Emergency Services

Consult a Doctor as soon as possible. Maintain distance with people around. Don’t Freak Out!Help the country win this battle against Covid19. Be a Saviour and save millions of lives. Cooperate with the Hospital staff and Management. Contact the emergency number or Contact Central Helpline Number for corona–virus: +91-11-23978046
You are safe-still maintain healthy life style
Be careful. Maintain good personal hygiene and social distancing. Also feel free to re-test yourself, whenever symptoms show up and consult a doctor.
\"Congrats..!! You are healthy. Please spread awareness around you. \"
You are totally out of danger. Maintain personal hygiene and social distancing. Enjoy this Lockdown with your family. Also feel free to re-test yourself, whenever symptoms show up.
Thanks! Your response has been recorded.
Login Error, please use forgot if you already registered.
Fields Are Empty! Please provide valid email and password.
Recorded Successfully. Uploading your coughing audio and other useful data to our database....Please Wait...
Uploading finished..Our AI based servers are improving with this information and your result will be available soon..Thanks!!
